GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.15.78
GSD.description:
ftrace: Fix use-after-free for dynamic ftrace_ops

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.78 by commit 88561a66777e7a2fe06638c6dcb22a9fae0b6733, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit edb096e00724f02db5f6ec7900f3bbd465c6c76f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ftrace: Fix use-after-free for dynamic ftrace_ops
